about_the_game:
Ever wanted to go beyond the classical elements of wind, water, fire, and earth? Wished there were animations suitable for time-warping mages or advanced-civilization machines?

Take your battles to the next dimension with Animations Collection II: Quantum, featuring a brand new set of thrilling special effects handcrafted at 60 frames-per-second (FPS). Break the mold of traditional JRPG elements and introduce a touch of unconventionality through these animations designed with the concepts of space and time.

Unleash your imagination and redefine your game’s skills and magic to leave your players in awe!

Features:

  • Includes RPG Maker MV Demo Project for easy copy/paste implementation into your project right out of the box.
  • 10 unorthodox magic spell animations.
  • 10 special skill animations.
  • 6 physical attack animations.
  • 60 FPS and 30 FPS versions of each animation, for a total of 52 animation sheets
detailed_description:
Ever wanted to go beyond the classical elements of wind, water, fire, and earth? Wished there were animations suitable for time-warping mages or advanced-civilization machines?

Take your battles to the next dimension with Animations Collection II: Quantum, featuring a brand new set of thrilling special effects handcrafted at 60 frames-per-second (FPS). Break the mold of traditional JRPG elements and introduce a touch of unconventionality through these animations designed with the concepts of space and time.

Unleash your imagination and redefine your game’s skills and magic to leave your players in awe!

Features:

  • Includes RPG Maker MV Demo Project for easy copy/paste implementation into your project right out of the box.
  • 10 unorthodox magic spell animations.
  • 10 special skill animations.
  • 6 physical attack animations.
  • 60 FPS and 30 FPS versions of each animation, for a total of 52 animation sheets

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Animations Collection II: Quantum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Inspired by the themes of space and time, Animations Collection II: Quantum offers a unique set of dynamic, easy-to-implement special effects designed to enrich the variation of your characters’ arsenal and impress your players.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
